channel.title: Home on Juan Andrés Nin - Programmer and Game Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Juan Andrés Nin - Programmer and Game Designer

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Juan Andrés Nin a game programmer and designer from Uruguay with 10 years of professional experience. Previously I worked at Ironhide Game Studio. I have worked on the following games: Junkworld Worked as lead programmer on multiple prototypes during preproduction and led a team of three programmers from this stage onto softlaunch Kingdom Rush Vengeance Worked on a team of three programmers making a new engine using C++ and cocos2d-x.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is a first post on a blog which hopefully sees new content in the future.
